start: Welcome to a very normal platformer
This is the tutorial, where I tell you how to play the game
But if you've played platformers before I'm sure you'll figure it out
flag: Wow! You reached the very shiny flag! Congratulations!
flag_delay: What did you actually expect touching some random shiny flag to achieve?
Did you even check that you're allowed to touch it? Do you usually randomly walk up to flags and touch them?
What if it was my flag? Would you touch my flag without my permission?

brick_wall.text: Ah! A brick wall! How am I going to get through?
Are you blind? Can you not see the very conveniently placed shovel right in front of you?

brick_wall_delay.text: [sigh] It's like talking to a brick wall
I can't seem to pick it up
Oh yeah I forgot. You don't actually have hands. Why are you trying to pick up a shovel without hands?
How on earth am I going to get through without the very conveniently placed shovel?
Eh, you'll find a way. Let me grab that shovel

through_brick_wall.text: Oh yeah I forgot to tell you, the devs forgot to add collision to brick walls. Very convenient!

first_dude.text: Sorry if that came across as rude
I guess it's a bit weird if someone randomly comes up to you and asks you if you have any friends
However it is an important question. It wasn't meant to be rude
This is a multiplayer game, so some levels are not possible alone
(We had to justify implementing WebSockets somehow...)
Press F if you have no friends (NOTE: Does not generate friends, just skips level)

flag: GET YOUR DIRTY HANDS OFF MY FLAG
other_side: Wow you actually made it! Congratulations!
Remember to let your friend through! (or not)
Wow! You managed to touch some random blue cube in some random cave! Congratulations!

right_area: Wow you managed to go through a wall. Don't think you're outsmarting me...
Are you assuming this pressure plate actually does something?

end.text: Sorry, the magic blue square hasn't loaded in yet
There's another one up there but I doubt you can reach it
Have you tried stepping on every pressure plate at random until it works?
